thread.title: Reese Witherspoon at the Golden Globes Is a Twin of Herself From 10 Years Ago
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon at the Golden Globes Is a Twin of Herself From 10 Years Ago

title: Reese Witherspoon at the Golden Globes Is a Twin of Herself From 10 Years Ago
text:
Reese Witherspoon at the Golden Globes Is a Twin of Herself From 10 Years Ago 
Can you tell the difference between Reese 2007 and Reese 2017? Most Popular By Helin Jung Jan 8, 2017 Reese Witherspoon wore a strapless yellow gown to the Golden Globes on Sunday. Yellow has been an incredibly popular color on the red carpet lately, and being Reese, she wore it well. See how pretty?   But the best part about the look wasn't the flattering silhouette or the bright color, it was the fact that it's a reprisal of the dress she wore to the Golden Globes in 2007. The year before, she had won the Golden Globe for best actress in a comedy or musical award for her performance in Walk the Line , and she beamed in her canary Nina Ricci dress and new bangs. Most Popular This year, she's back at the awards show as a presenter, wearing what had to have been an intentional reference to her look from 10 years ago. The takeaway? She looked fabulous then and she looks great now. Ageless! Getty
